To protect your back
• Sit up straight with your 
bottom against the back 
of your chair. Tuck a small 
cushion behind your waist 
if you wish.
• When you pick something 
up, bend your knees, not 
your back.
• Try to stand tall.
Infections
During pregnancy, changes 
take place in your immune 
system which may make you 
more susceptible to some 
infections. Vaccination can 
help prevent disease or make 
the illness less serious.
